src/lib/components/DashTabulator.react.j.description:
DashTabulator is a wrapper for a data table library (e.g. Tabulator).
All table operations are abstracted for easier migration to another library.

methods.name: initTable
methods.docblock:
Initialize the data table instance.
This is the only place Tabulator-specific code should exist.
methods.description:
Initialize the data table instance.
This is the only place Tabulator-specific code should exist.

methods.name: getTableOptions
methods.docblock:
Return table options for Tabulator.
Replace this method when switching to another table library.
methods.description:
Return table options for Tabulator.
Replace this method when switching to another table library.

id.description: ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

data.description: Data to display in the table.

datasetName.description: Name of the corresponding Dataiku dataset. Used for analytics purposes only, as a hash (not the actual name).

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

cellEdited.description: cellEdited captures the cell that was clicked on
